name: Marketing Whitepaper
description: Professional template for product whitepapers and marketing documents

sections.name: executive_summary
sections.title: Executive Summary
sections.prompt: Write a concise executive summary for {topic}. Highlight the key problems addressed and the value proposition.

sections.name: introduction
sections.title: Introduction
sections.prompt: Write an engaging introduction about {topic}. Provide context and background for the reader.

sections.name: market_landscape
sections.title: Market Landscape
sections.prompt: Describe the current market landscape for {topic}. Include trends, challenges, and opportunities.

children.name: market_trends
children.title: Market Trends
children.prompt: Analyze current trends in the market related to {topic}.

children.name: market_challenges
children.title: Industry Challenges
children.prompt: Describe the major challenges facing the industry that {topic} addresses.

sections.name: problem_statement
sections.title: Problem Statement
sections.prompt: Clearly articulate the problems that {topic} solves. Focus on the pain points of the target audience.

sections.name: solution_overview
sections.title: Solution Overview
sections.prompt: Provide a comprehensive overview of {topic} as a solution. Explain how it addresses the identified problems.

children.name: solution_features
children.title: Key Features
children.prompt: Describe the key features of {topic} that make it an effective solution.

children.name: solution_architecture
children.title: Solution Architecture
children.prompt: Provide a high-level description of the architecture or approach used in {topic}.

children.name: solution_differentiators
children.title: Differentiators
children.prompt: Explain what makes {topic} different from alternative solutions in the market.

sections.name: benefits
sections.title: Benefits
sections.prompt: Describe the benefits of implementing {topic}. Include both business and technical benefits.

children.name: benefits_business
children.title: Business Benefits
children.prompt: Explain the business benefits of {topic}, including ROI, cost savings, and revenue opportunities.

children.name: benefits_technical
children.title: Technical Benefits
children.prompt: Describe the technical benefits of {topic}, such as scalability, reliability, and performance improvements.

sections.name: case_studies
sections.title: Case Studies
sections.prompt: Provide hypothetical or real case studies that demonstrate the successful implementation of {topic}.

sections.name: implementation
sections.title: Implementation Approach
sections.prompt: Describe a recommended approach for implementing {topic}. Include timelines, resources, and best practices.

children.name: implementation_timeline
children.title: Implementation Timeline
children.prompt: Suggest a typical timeline for implementing {topic}.

children.name: implementation_best_practices
children.title: Best Practices
children.prompt: Share best practices for a successful implementation of {topic}.

sections.name: roi_analysis
sections.title: ROI Analysis
sections.prompt: Provide a framework for analyzing the return on investment for {topic}. Include potential cost savings and revenue impacts.

sections.name: conclusion
sections.title: Conclusion
sections.prompt: Write a compelling conclusion that summarizes the key points about {topic} and includes a clear call to action.

sections.name: about_company
sections.title: About the Company
sections.prompt: Write a professional description of the company behind {topic}. Highlight relevant expertise and credibility.
